The Dinjid Bay
The Dinjid Bay is my home
My fellows are famous near and far
The Qaidam Bay is my home
I miss it from afar
You can keep me from herding horses to a faraway land
But no one can stop me from seeing my lover
You can keep me from grazing sheep to a faraway land
But no one can stop me from seeing my lover

The Rising Sun
The rising sun gradually melts into the morning fog
I cannot forget our date three years ago
I can only see you in my dreams
The rising sun gradually melts into the dark clouds
I havenРђЎt seen you for three years
I can only see you in my dreams

The Shanghai-Made Semiconductor
The Shanghai-made semiconductor
Is the best reward to me
Because IРђЎm excellent at work and courageous
When I herd the horses
I listen to it
When I return to my dorm
I listen to it

The Achnatherum Splendens in the North
Picking cow dung in the Achnatherum Splendens in the north
I am going on a long journey
Please take good care of yourself, father
Grazing sheep on the sunny slope
I am going on a long journey
Please take good care of yourself, mother
How can we eat a load of lake salt?
How can I take you to travel with me?

Dating
Riding my horse on the grassland
The achnatherum splendens sweep over my robe
I must be quiet
So my neighbor wonРђЎt see me
 
Riding my horse on the grassland
My horseРђЎs bit rings
I must be quiet
So my neighborРђЎs wife and her dog wonРђЎt see me
 
We said we would find back the red male camels, but where are they?
We appointed to meet on the russet sands, but where were you?
The red male camel led the flock to the water and I couldnРђЎt stop them
It was all dark when I got to the sands and I couldnРђЎt help it
 
We said we would find back the brown male camels, but where are they?
We appointed to meet on the bronze sands, but where were you?
The brown male camel led the flock to the lake and I couldnРђЎt stop them
It was freezing when I got to the sands and I couldnРђЎt help it

Uncle Lama Visiting His Lover
Mongolian folk song
Arranged by Hanggai Band
 
Mount the horse and light a cigarette
IРђЎm rushing at full speed
If you want to know where am I heading for?
IРђЎm going to see my dearest pretty girl for sure!
 
I remember that I had loaded 32 cakes on the horse
But I lost eight of them after crossing two sand dunes
 
Bring out my sturdy steed
Take the most valuable silver saddlery
If you want to know where am I heading for?
IРђЎm going to see my dearest pretty girl for sure!
I remember that I had loaded 32 cakes on the horse
But I lost another eight after crossing two forests
 
Bring out my sturdy steed
Take the most valuable silver saddlery
If you want to know where am I heading for?
IРђЎm going to see my dearest pretty girl for sure!
 
I remember that I had loaded 32 cakes on the horse
But I lost the rest of them after passing two river bends

Gunagen Ullan Bataar
Wander in the arms of the mountains
Drink the clear dew to my fill
Carry my horse pole and follow the natureРђЎs rule
A huge screen of the epic appears beneath the clouds
IРђЎm waiting lonely, IРђЎm singing in tears
LetРђЎs be wandering, wandering and singing
My dear hero
You are carrying my happiness and sadness
My little three-year-old Ullan Bataar
